title: My Diana mid just bought an Ohmwrecker un-ironically in my ranked game
body:
god bless silver.

we still won.... thankfully it was her last item... though I don't know what she thought she would use it for... I was rammus... i held turret agro for a good 20-30 seconds during one fight... and lived....

game took 51 minutes ffs... maybe if my mid laner had a real item we woulda won faster....

edit: i just noticed she also bought 15 "mana biscuits" during the game... now i am all for early pots, but wow, that is a lot of gold wasted.....
